entry.string: This module allows you to create and display sub-items for any module item. In the words of the author :
entry.translation: Thees mudoole-a elloos yuoo tu creete-a und deespley soob-items fur uny mudoole-a item. In zee vurds ooff zee oothur :

entry.string:
For example, if you want to have a pubtype "cooking recipe". This pubtype could be to store the ingredients of the meal, thus there would be required a list of input fields: ingredient1, quantity1, pic1(extended info :-) ) , ingredient2, quantity2, pic2,...

The disadvantage of this is the high number of fields to ensure, that there your users aren't going against the limit. Furthermore there are always displayed all input fields. And of course it's not a very nice way to do it.

As I didn't know how to do this better, I had a dream about a module, which can be hooked from any other module and which is able to display / provide editing / etc. for subitems to an item. I had a dream about a table, which saves the information, which DD-Object stores the subitems of "module" / "itemtype" combination and another table containing which DD-Itemids belong to "module" / "itemtype" / "itemid" in this DD-Object (1 to n Relation). I had the dream to share my module with the community. Now, the module is here, and all dreams got true. If you didn't get my technical information, don't worry.
entry.translation:
Fur ixemple-a, iff yuoo vunt tu hefe-a a poobtype-a "cuukeeng receepe-a". Thees poobtype-a cuoold be-a tu sture-a zee ingredeeents ooff zee meel, thoos zeere-a vuoold be-a reqooured a leest ooff inpoot feeelds: ingredeeent1, qoounteety1, peec1(ixtended inffu :-) ) , ingredeeent2, qoounteety2, peec2,...

Zee deesedfuntege-a ooff thees is zee heegh noomber ooff feeelds tu insoore-a, thet zeere-a yuoor users eren't gueeng egeeenst zee leemit. Um de hur de hur de hur. Foorzeermure-a zeere-a ere-a elveys deespleyed ell inpoot feeelds. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Und ooff cuoorse-a it's nut a fery neece-a vey tu du it. Um de hur de hur de hur.

Es I deedn't knoo hoo tu du thees better, I hed a dreem ebuoot a mudoole-a, vheech cun be-a huuked frum uny oozeer mudoole-a und vheech is eble-a tu deespley / prufeede-a ideeting / itc. fur soobeetems tu un item. I hed a dreem ebuoot a teble-a, vheech sefes zee inffurmeshun, vheech DD-Oobject stures zee soobeetems ooff "mudoole-a" / "eetemtype-a" cumbeeneshun und unuzeer teble-a cunteeening vheech DD-Itemeeds belung tu "mudoole-a" / "eetemtype-a" / "eetemid" in thees DD-Oobject (1 tu n Releshun). I hed zee dreem tu shere-a my mudoole-a veet zee cummooneety. Bork bork bork! Noo, zee mudoole-a is here-a, und ell dreems gut trooe-a. Iff yuoo deedn't get my techneecel inffurmeshun, dun't vurry. Bork bork bork!

entry.string:
1. install module
  2. goto dynamicdata admin area, new object, create a dynamic data object , which should hold the subitem information (you must have one field with the ItemID, default 0, display only) -> remember the objectid, edit label (used for display) and name (used for custom default template)
  3. goto subitems module, admin area -> add link -> type in objectid (from previsously created dd-object), module name, itemtype
  4. goto module modules, hooks -> subitems -> enable the hook for the module /itemtype combination, you created the link for
-> now it should work (tested with custom pubtype)
entry.translation:
1. instell mudoole-a
  2. gutu dynemeecdeta edmeen erea, noo oobject, creete-a a dynemeec deta oobject , vheech shuoold huld zee soobeetem inffurmeshun (yuoo moost hefe-a oone-a feeeld veet zee ItemID, deffoolt 0, deespley oonly) -> remeembur zee oobjecteed, ideet lebel (used fur deespley) und neme-a (used fur coostum deffoolt templete-a)
  3. gutu soobeetems mudoole-a, edmeen erea -> edd leenk -> type-a in oobjecteed (frum prefeesuoosly creeted dd-oobject), mudoole-a neme-a, itemtype-a
  4. gutu mudoole-a mudooles, huuks -> soobeetems -> ineble-a zee huuk fur zee mudoole-a /itemtype-a cumbeeneshun, yuoo creeted zee leenk fur
-> noo it shuoold vurk (tested veet coostum poobtype-a)

entry.string: new/create/modify/update/delete -- Allows you to create/update sub-items
entry.translation: noo/creete-a/mudeeffy/updete-a/delete-a -- Elloos yuoo tu creete-a/updete-a soob-items

entry.string: display -- Allows you to display sub-items
entry.translation: deespley -- Elloos yuoo tu deespley soob-items

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
